name: Jack Renner
personality: Cocky, reckless, thinks Goodsprings owes him something.
description: Jack escaped from NCR custody and wants to use Goodsprings as a hideout. The town wants him gone.
questHooks: Threatens the town unless someone helps him.
Claims he stole something from NCR that 'buzzes' when he sleeps.
Knows a Powder Ganger cell near Primm planning something big.
